text: Anatoli Viktorovich Fedyukin (; January 26, 1952 Great Olympic Encyclopedia, vol.1-2, Moscow:Olympia Press Publisher, 2006, entry on "Федюкин", available online – July 29, 2020) was a Soviet/Russian handball player. He competed in the 1976 Summer Olympics and in the 1980 Summer Olympics. He was born in Voronezh, Soviet Union. Fedyukin died on July 29, 2020 in Moscow at the age of 69.На 69-м году ушел из жизни выдающийся гандболист сборной СССР и ЦСКА, победитель Олимпийских игр и чемпионата мира Анатолий Федюкин ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union
title: Anatoli Fedyukin
